mdRecord.dcterms:title: Preliminary chart of Rappahannock River Virginia from entrance to Deep Creek / from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States ; triangulation by E. Blunt, Capt. W.R. Palmer Topl. Engrs. and J. Farley Assts. ; topography by J. Seib & I. Hull Adams Assts. ; hydrography by the parties under the command of Lieuts. Comdg. S.P. Lee, J.J. Almy & R. Wainwright U.S.N. Assts
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Adams, I. Hull.
Almy, John Jay, 1815-1895
Blunt, Edmund, 1799-1866
Farley, John, 1802 or 1803-1874
Lee, S. P.
Lindenkohl, A.
Maedel, E. A.
Palmer, W. R. (William R.), -1862
Seib, John.
Sipe, E. H.
Smith, M. L. (Martin Luther), 1819-1866
United States Coast Survey.
Wainwright, Richard, 1817-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 73 x 42 cm. on sheet 76 x 46 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Oriented with north to upper right .
Engd. by E. A. Maedel & App. F. H. Sipe.
Verified M.L. Smith Capt. Topl. Engrs. Asst. in charge of office.
Includes sailing directions and additional notes on soundings, etc.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect, with part of the left margin removed at center of sheet. Lindn-backed.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nautical charts--Virginia--Rappahannock River--Maps.
Rappahannock River (Va.)--Maps.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
